notes: Successive attacks with Stygian Desolator do not stack the debuff, but refresh the duration instead.
The attacks first apply the debuff, then their own damage.
Works against every unit, including wards, buildings and allied units.
Replaces the projectile particle of ranged heroes with a red projectile.
Fully stacks with the Lesser Corruption of Blight Stone and the Corruption of Desolator.
abilities.description: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by 12 for 15 seconds.

trivia: Stygian Desolator was the name of Desolator in the original Defense of the Ancients.
